15 Oct 2017 • on tech internet

Fighting link-rot with webrecorder.io

The web is rich in information but due to its highly dynamic nature some of this information eventually disappears (see link rot). I recently found webrecorder.io, a free service that allows you to “Create high-fidelity, interactive web archives of any web site you browse.”

The software is great, it lets you create recordings directly from their site, or you can build and install a Chrome extension, see instructions here.

I built one for myself, you can get it here, use at your own risk.
